# Football Viz Hub

A home for my **football visualisation work** across **AI UP** and **TMM** pods.



## Browse by season


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
base_dir <- "."

season_dirs <- list.dirs(base_dir, recursive = FALSE, full.names = FALSE)
season_dirs <- season_dirs[grepl("^Season\\s+\\d+$", season_dirs)]
season_dirs <- sort(season_dirs)

links <- vapply(season_dirs, function(season) {
  path <- gsub("\\\\", "/", file.path(season, ""))
  url <- utils::URLencode(path)
  sprintf("## [%s](%s)", season, url)
}, character(1))

cat(paste(links, collapse = "\n"), "\n")
```
